text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Lawyer" means an individual who is admitted to the Bar of the Court of Appeals of Maryland.

section.section: "Practice law" has the meaning stated by the Court of Appeals of Maryland.
"Practice law" includes the meaning stated in § 10-101(h) of the Business Occupations and Professions Article.

text.section: "Society" means the Legal Mutual Liability Insurance Society of Maryland.
